title: Silver jumps Rs 4,500/kg, gold rebounds despite easing US-Iran tensions. What should your strategy be?
desc: Gold and silver futures saw an upward opening on MCX on Wednesday. This occurred even as progress in US-Iran talks eased geopolitical tensions, reducing safe-haven demand for precious metals. Analysts suggest caution due to market volatility. Physical gold prices varied across major Indian cities. Investors are advised to avoid fresh positions this week.

title: Dagoon on a roll, dominates national junior netfest in GenSan
desc: Jan Cadee Dagoon continued her blazing run on the national junior circuit, delivering another commanding performance at the Mayor Lorelie Pacquiao National Junior Tennis Championships at the GenSan City and Camp Lira courts

title: Tesla dodges 30-day suspension in California after removing 'Autopilot'
desc: The decision comes a month after Tesla discontinued Autopilot, its basic driver-assistance system.

title: Hilary Duff addresses 'complicated' family dynamic amid rumored feud
desc: Hilary Duff has made a rare comment on her strained dynamic with sister Haylie and dad Robert, reflecting that 'just because you're born into a family doesn't mean that it always stays together.'
